Clark_Co_Traffic
-
OBJECTID varchar pk fk - Machine_Learning_Model
Accident_Rec_Num int pk fk - Dashboard
X FLOAT
Y FLOAT
Crash_Severity VARCHAR(50)
County VARCHAR(50)
Crash_Date DATE
Crash_Year INT
Crash_Time VARCHAR(50)
Weather VARCHAR(50)
Fatalities INT
Injured INT
Property_Damage_Only VARCHAR(50)
Injury_Type VARCHAR(50)
Crash_Type VARCHAR(50)
Total_Vehicles INT
V1_Type VARCHAR(50)
V1_Driver_Age INT
V1_Action VARCHAR(50)
V1_Driver_Factors VARCHAR(50)
V1_Driver_Distracted VARCHAR(50)
V1_Vehicle_Factors VARCHAR(50)
V1_Most_Harmful_Event VARCHAR(50)
V2_Type VARCHAR(50)
V2_Driver_Age INT
V2_Action VARCHAR(50)
V2_Driver_Factors VARCHAR(50)
V2_Driver_Distracted VARCHAR(50)
V2_Vehicle_Factors VARCHAR(50)
V2_Most_Harmful_Event VARCHAR(50)
Nonmotorist_Factors VARCHAR(50)
Factors_Roadway VARCHAR(50)
Lighting VARCHAR(50)
HWY_Factors VARCHAR(50)
Pedalcyclist VARCHAR(50)
Pedestrian VARCHAR(50)
Motorcyclist VARCHAR(50)
AnimalType VARCHAR(50)

Dashboard
-
OBJECTID varcher pk
Accident_Rec_Num int pk fk - Non_Motor_Accident
X FLOAT
Y FLOAT

Crash_Date DATE
Crash_Year INT

V1_Type VARCHAR(50)

Lighting VARCHAR(50)
HWY_Factors VARCHAR(50)
Pedalcyclist VARCHAR(50)

Motorcyclist VARCHAR(50)

Machine_Learning_Model
-

Non_Motor_Accident
-
OBJECTID varchar pk
Accident_Rec_Num int pk fk - Clark_Co_Traffic
X FLOAT
Y FLOAT
Crash_Severity VARCHAR(50)
Crash_Date DATE
Crash_Year INT
Crash_Time VARCHAR(50)
Weather VARCHAR(50)
Fatalities VARCHAR(50)
Injured VARCHAR(50)
Injury_Type VARCHAR(50)
V1_Type VARCHAR(50)
V1_Driver_Age INT
V1_Action VARCHAR(50)
V1_Driver_Factors VARCHAR(50)
V1_Driver_Distracted VARCHAR(50)
V1_Vehicle_Factors VARCHAR(50)
V1_Most_Harmful_Event VARCHAR(50)
Nonmotorist_Factors VARCHAR(50)
Factors_Roadway VARCHAR(50)
Lighting VARCHAR(50)
